title: The Beloved Daughter
description: Behind North Korea's closed borders, a young girl is dying for freedom ...It's her father's Christian faith, not the famine ravaging her province, that most threatens her well-being. Chung-Cha is only a child when her family is forced into one of the most notorious prison camps the free world has known.Her crime?Being the daughter of a Christian.The Beloved Daughter is a gripping, inspirational novel that takes readers into the heart of North Korea. With grace, gentleness, and skill, award-winning novelist Alana Terry weaves a beautiful story of faith, redemption, and love that no darkness can overcome.
author: Alana Terry
